titleStmt.title: Queries of highest consideration, proposed to the five Holland ministers and the Scotch Commissioners (so called) upon occasion of their late printed apologies for themselves and their churches. In all humble reverence presented to the view of the Right Honourable the Houses of the High Court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Roger, 1604?-1683.

titleStmt.title: Queries of highest consideration, proposed to the five Holland ministers and the Scotch Commissioners (so called) upon occasion of their late printed apologies for themselves and their churches. In all humble reverence presented to the view of the Right Honourable the Houses of the High Court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Roger, 1604?-1683.

notesStmt.note: With two title pages. The second title page reads: "Queries of highest consideration, proposed to Mr. Tho. Goodwin Mr. Phillip Nye Mr. Wil. Bridges Mr. Jer. Burroughs Mr. Sidr. Simpson.". The second title page appears to match Wing (2nd ed.) W2770. Perhaps this item is another edition of Wing W2770 with an added title page.
Annotation on Thomason copy: the "IV" in the imprint date has been crossed out; "1643".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
